q: not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mr. Mike Pence ruled out a White House bid in a letter to supporters that also fueled speculation he is instead planning a run for governor. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in the letter.`` In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.''

names of stars such as Rihanna and Katy Perry are being thrown into the mix in an attempt to compete with TV giant, American Idol. A friend of Cheryl Cole 's boyfriend, Derek Hough revealed: Everyone thinks Cheryl Cole has the judging job on US X Factor in the bag.`` The truth is, nothing has been signed and the producers still aren't convinced.`` They are more keen to get a big US star like Katy Perry or Rihanna on the panel- someone who will bring credibility to the show and who is already popular in the US.
